⏩ DIAGONAL COLOR PLACEMENT: The strategic diagonal arrangement of colors on the keyboard enhances finger movement efficiency, enabling you to use the same finger for each color.
⏩ ERGOTHERAPIST-ENDORSED: This product is highly recommended by occupational therapists and educational psychologists, underlining its effectiveness and professional credibility.

⏩ USER-FRIENDLY INSTALLATION: Simple, quick, and straightforward application. Our stickers are designed for hassle-free installation.
⏩ LEARN TYPING FASTER: Great for all users, not just for those with learning difficulties. Ideal for anyone looking to enhance their typing speed or learn touch typing effectively.
⏩ MULTIPLE LANGUAGES SUPPORTED: Our product supports multiple languages for global applicability, making it a versatile educational tool for a wide audience.
product_description: Enhance your typing experience with Geeky Dyslexic Keyboard Stickers Do you or your child have difficulty typing because of dyslexia or other learning disabilities? Look no further. Geeky color coded keyboard stickers are designed to make your life easier and easier to navigate the keyboard. Advantages and features: SUITABLE FOR LEARNING DISCUSSIONS - These stickers are designed to help those who have difficulties with dyslexia, dysorthography and dyspraxia, among other learning disabilities. COLOR CODED FOR EFFICIENCY - Strategic color coding of each sticker helps speed up the typing process by engaging eyes, brains and fingers smoothly and intuitively. MATERIAL & DURABILITY - Made of premium matte PVC, these stickers are waterproof, ensuring they will withstand daily wear and tear. MULTIPLE COMPATIBILITY These stickers are compatible with over 40 keyboard layouts, including USA, UK, Intermediate Canada, Canada, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Estonian, Faroese, Finnish, French, German, Greenlandic, Hungarian, Iberoporguese, American, Icelandic, Irish, Italian. , Japanese (lock) le), Latin. Vian (Qwerk) ty), Lithuanian, Maltese, Norwegian, Paraguayan, Polish, Portuguese (Brazil), Portuguese, Romanian, Scottish Gaelic, Slovak, Slovenian, Croatian, Serbian, Spanish, Latam, Swedish, Finnish, Swiss, Turkish. Two sizes for versatility: available in 14mm size for laptop and computer keyboards and 13mm for tablet keyboards.

short_description: Split-Key Ergonomic Design: One-piece split layout separates keys into left and right zones to reduce wrist bending and support a natural hand position, helping minimize strain during long hours of typing.

Long Key Travel & Tactile Feedback: Extended key travel delivers responsive, tactile feedback with audible confirmation, similar to brown mechanical switches. Built for durability with up to 20 million keystrokes.

Old-School Curved Row Design: Stepped, curved key rows promote a natural typing posture and reduce fatigue during long sessions. Made from high-quality ABS with membrane switches and 4.2 mm key travel.
Ergonomic Curved Keycaps: Curved keycaps with flatter tops and back edges fit fingertip contours for improved comfort and control. Available in black, beige, and white color options.
Natural Learning Curve: Ergonomic shape may require a short adjustment period. Most users adapt within 1–2 weeks and experience improved comfort and reduced wrist pressure with continued use.

Multiple Layout & Laser Printing Options: Includes standard US layout. Additional layouts available with minimum order (20 pcs), including German, French, Italian, Spanish, UK, Japanese, Korean, Nordic, Hebrew, Arabic, and more.
Extra-Long 6 ft Wired Connection: USB-A cable supports flexible desk placement and clean routing. Plug-and-play setup requires no drivers or software.
Wide Windows Compatibility & Warranty: Compatible with Windows 7, 8, 10, and 11. Package includes keyboard and manual. Backed by a 12-month limited warranty via the Perixx website.
